markdownRemark.html:
I’m a mechanical engineer currently based in Buenos Aires, working as a software consultant.

Some of my current interests:

  • software development in Clojure/Script, data intensive apps, progressive web apps
  • indie businesses, career design, future of work, productivity, self development, languages
  • container homes, campervans and functional interior design
